content.prompt: Which of the following is an example of a pure public good?

choices.label: A hamburger sold in a restaurant on a college campus
Medical education to become a doctor
Paper pulp produced with pollution emissions
A ticket to the movie theater

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
